attributes.action: Do Not Leave The European Union (EU)
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to show support for the vast proportion of the UK public view to not leave the EU; to prevent the Cabinet from listening to minority fanatics.

Despite some known EU problems, the overall affect of the EU is a positive one for the UK. There are Economical, Business, Health & Social, Crime & Justice, Environmental and Educational Benefits, which most of the population can appreciate, rather than just listening to tabloid headlines.

Stay in the EU.
